name: Green Hag
description: A hideous creature with gnarled, sickly green skin and long, clawed hands.
memorable: Known for manipulating and tormenting victims, using illusions and dark magic.
goals: Thrives on the misery of others and lures unsuspecting victims into traps.
relations: May be allied with other fey creatures or dark entities, frequently acts independently.
strengths: Innate spellcasting, ability to deceive, and cursed hexes that debilitate foes.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain damage types and relies on spells for combat advantage.
attacks: Multiattack with claws dealing slashing damage and using Hex to debilitate targets.
most_powerful_ability: Hex, which curses targets with debilitating effects lasting 30 days.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, reflecting good awareness of surroundings.
skills: Skilled in deception and stealth, making it adept at manipulation and surprise attacks.
additional_information: Amphibious trait allows breathing in both air and water.
Can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices to create confusion.
Innate spellcasting allows casting various spells at will.
Illusory appearance to disguise its true form.
Can turn invisible for stealthy tactics.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster capable of casting spells like invisibility and minor illusion without material components.
test_queries: cunning fey with green skin and claws
malevolent forest creature that uses illusions
swamp dwelling hag with magic powers
monster that curses its victims with hexes
deceptive creature that thrives on others' misery
